about_meta: WackyFoki is a platform for sharing bizarre and unique recipes from around the world.
about_p1: WackyFoki is a community-based platform where people around the world share bizarre and creative recipes that go beyond traditional tastes.
about_p2: Anyone can easily upload recipes, view others' creations, and respond with comments and likes. Just because it looks weird doesn‚Äôt mean it tastes weird!
about_p3: It‚Äôs an open space for anyone who wants to explore food from a new perspective with fun and creativity. WackyFoki welcomes those moments.
about_p4: This platform is designed for everyone interested in cooking‚Äîfrom professional chefs to beginners, and even those curious about strange dishes.
about_p5: We believe experimental and unconventional recipes‚Äîeven funny and silly ones‚Äîare all valuable expressions of creativity. They become stories and connections.
about_p6: WackyFoki is more than a recipe-sharing site‚Äîit‚Äôs a digital playground to discover, document, and enjoy unique food cultures worldwide.
about_p7: Your feedback makes this platform better. Comments, likes, and suggestions all help make WackyFoki a warmer space. Share your unique recipe anytime.
about_p8: WackyFoki will continue to respect diverse perspectives on food and build a creative community. We believe small experiments can lead to global sharing.
about_ops_body: This site is a personal project and may generate revenue through Google AdSense and partner programs. Copyright belongs to each creator, and inappropriate content may be removed without prior notice. Contact:
about_notice: ‚Äª This platform is based on user-generated content. Inappropriate content may be removed without prior notice by the admin.
privacy_intro:
WackyFoki (the ‚ÄòService‚Äô) values user privacy and complies with the Personal Information Protection Act.
This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
privacy_section1_content:
When logging in with Google, we collect the following:
- Name, email address, profile photo
privacy_section2_content: Information is collected during the Google OAuth authentication process.
privacy_section3_content:
Collected data is used for:
- Login and user identification
- Personalized content delivery
privacy_section4_content: Data is deleted immediately when the user deletes their account or upon request.
privacy_section5_content: We do not share your information with third parties unless legally required.
privacy_section6_content: Cookies from Google Analytics and AdSense may be used for advertising and traffic analysis.
privacy_section7_content:
For any privacy-related inquiries, please email us at:
üìß contact@wackyfoki.com
terms_intro: These terms govern the use of WackyFoki (the ‚ÄòService‚Äô), outlining the rights, duties, and responsibilities between members and the service operator.
terms_1_content: These terms define the conditions of use, procedures, and responsibilities regarding the WackyFoki service.
terms_2_content:
Definitions used herein:
1. ‚ÄòMember‚Äô: a user who uses the service under these terms.
2. ‚ÄòContent‚Äô: includes images, text, video links uploaded by members.
terms_3_content: These terms become effective upon posting. We may revise them if necessary and will notify users via announcements.
terms_4_content: WackyFoki provides a content-based platform for users to upload and browse unique recipes.
terms_5_content: Services may be temporarily suspended for maintenance, emergencies, or other necessary reasons with prior notice.
terms_6_content:
Members shall not:
- Use others‚Äô personal information
- Register false content
- Infringe copyright or others‚Äô rights
- Violate public morals and order
terms_7_content: Copyright for content belongs to the uploader. The service may use it non-commercially for browsing and sharing.
terms_8_content: We are not responsible for the reliability or accuracy of content posted by members, nor do we intervene in member disputes.
alert_invalid_image_format: Only JPG, PNG, and WebP formats are supported.
contact_p1: Got a question about WackyFoki? For partnership inquiries, bug reports, or feedback, email us anytime below.
contact_owner_body: This site is personally operated by OriJin and is currently a test project. All inquiries: contact@wackyfoki.com
contact_response_guide: We usually respond within 48 hours. We value every suggestion or bug report sent to us.
contact_privacy_notice: Your email will be used only for replying to inquiries. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for more details.
